Description: Body and handle sherd of Corinthian Linear Style pottery miniature kotyle (kotyliskos); interior: painted black dot between inverted black triangles at rim, above three or four black bands; exterior: two narrow and one wide black band.
Bibliographic references: Venit 1982 / Painted Pottery from the Greek Mainland found in Egypt, 640-450 BC (p. 100, no. A148)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GB.318) (phase 3)
